verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Do you feel the world is broken (we do)
Do you feel the shadows deepen (we do)
Do you know that all the dark won't stop the light from getting through?
(we do)

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Is all creation groaning? (it is)
Is a new creation coming? (it is)
Is the glory of the Lord to be the light within our midst? (it is)
Is it good that we remind ourselves of this? (it is)

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Is anyone worthy? Is anyone whole? Is anyone able to break the seal and open the scroll?
The Lion of Judah who conquered the grave
He was David's root and the Lamb who died to ransom the slave

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Is He worthy? Is He worthy?
Of all blessing and honour and glory?
Is He worthy of this? He is

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Does the Father truly love us? (He does)
Does the Spirit move among us? (He does)
And does Jesus our Messiah hold forever those He loves? (He does)
Does our God intend to dwell again with us? (He does)
